htw.vs1.filesystem.Network.Discovery

Class DiscoveryListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • htw.vs1.filesystem.Network.Discovery.DiscoveryThread
        • htw.vs1.filesystem.Network.Discovery.DiscoveryListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DiscoveryListener
extends DiscoveryThread
    The DiscoveryListener is a simple server listening on the udp broadcasting port keeping the list of nearby servers up to date. Created by Felix on 20.09.2015.
